title: Breathwork
longDescription: In this guided ritual, breath becomes your anchor, a gentle yet powerful tool for shifting energy, settling the nervous system, and reconnecting to what matters. Whether you arrive with stress, fatigue, or curiosity, this practice will meet you where you are. No performance. No pressure. Just space to slow down, listen in, and breathe with intention. Each session is layered with rhythm, stillness and presence, a chance to let go, drop in, and return to yourself.

instructor.name: Amanda Berger
instructor.bio: Amanda brings over 17 years of experience in wellness and movement, creating transformative experiences that honor traditional practices while welcoming all levels of experience.

faq.question: Do I need any prior experience with breathwork?
faq.answer: No prior experience is necessary. Amanda will guide you through each practice, making it accessible for beginners while offering depth for experienced practitioners.

faq.question: What should I bring?
faq.answer: Just bring yourself and wear comfortable clothing. All materials and props will be provided.

title: Aufguss
shortDescription: Heat with purpose. Steam with soul.
longDescription: Guided by the Master, this ritual channels heat, scent and sound into a powerful sensory journey. Through intentional towel movement, steam is carried in waves, energising, releasing, and restoring. You don't just sit in the heat, you move through it. And on the other side, you return lighter, clearer, and deeply reset.

instructor.name: Amanda Berger
instructor.bio: Amanda is a certified Aufguss master, trained in traditional German sauna techniques. She brings years of experience in creating transformative heat therapy experiences.

faq.question: What should I wear?
faq.answer: We recommend wearing a comfortable swimsuit or swimwear. A clean towel will be provided for you to sit on inside the sauna.

faq.question: Is this suitable for beginners?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Amanda will guide you through the entire experience, and you are free to exit the sauna at any time if you feel uncomfortable.

title: Sound
longDescription: This ritual invites you into stillness, a deep listening experience where vibration becomes medicine. With gongs, bowls, and resonant tones, sound gently moves through the body, clearing noise and quieting the mind. There's nothing to do but receive. As the layers of sound rise and fall, you'll soften, unwind, and return to a deeper rhythm within.

instructor.name: Amanda Berger
instructor.bio: Amanda's sound healing practice draws from years of studying vibrational medicine and its effects on the nervous system. She creates deeply restorative experiences using traditional instruments.

faq.question: What happens during a sound healing session?
faq.answer: You'll lie comfortably while Amanda creates layers of sound using various instruments. The vibrations help shift your brainwaves into a deeply relaxed state.

faq.question: Do I need to bring anything?
faq.answer: We provide all materials including mats, bolsters, and blankets. Just wear comfortable clothing and bring an open mind.
